## Source: ossf-package-analysis (02468ca2a6c6786284502b294e1d557b03baf8779034cba7c4df205dc77bd710)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bytesap' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
